description:
Taiki`s team arrives at the Monitamons` homeland, the Shinobi Zone, but it has also been attacked by the Bagra Army, who took their castle and kidnapped their princess. Mushamon of the Bagra Army demands the Zone`s Code Crown in return for the princess, so Taiki and a team of dropout Monitamons set off for the shrine where the Code Crown is kept. However, when they reach the shrine, they learn that the only way to obtain the Code Crown is to make a Digimon called Karatenmon laugh. They show him funny videos, jokes, comedy routines, and even funny DigiXros combinations, but Karatenmon is a tough audience! Can anyone manage to make him laugh and obtain the Code Crown?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shinobi Zone and the Comic Ninja Battle!
シノビゾーン, お笑い忍者バトル!
